mapper.select: select todo_no as todoNo, todo_post_no as todoPostNo, todo_pro_no as todoProNo, todo_title as todoTitle, todo_content as todoContent, todo_writer as todoWriter, todo_member as todoMember, todo_start_date as todoStartDate, todo_end_date as todoEndDate, todo_progress as todoProgress from todo where todo_writer = #{memberNo} or todo_member = #{memberNo}

select dc_no as dcNo, dc_post_no as dcPostNo, dc_writer as dcWriter, dc_maker as dcMaker, dc_content as dcContent, dc_date as dcDate, dc_yn as dcYn, dc_decision as dcDecision, dc_comment as dcComment, dc_confirm_date as dcConfirmDate from decision where dc_writer = #{memberNo} or dc_maker = #{memberNo}
select pro_title as proTitle from project where pro_member_no = #{memberNo}

select upload_no as uploadNo, post_no as postNo, member_no as memberNo, upload_date as uploadDate, upload_subject as uploadSubject, upload_path as uploadPath from upload where member_no = #{memberNo} and upload_subject='이미지'

select upload_no as uploadNo, post_no as postNo, member_no as memberNo, upload_date as uploadDate, upload_subject as uploadSubject, upload_path as uploadPath from upload where member_no = #{memberNo} and upload_subject='파일'
select link_no as linkNo, post_no as postNo, member_no as memberNo, link_date as linkDate, link_title as linkTitle, link_address as linkAddress from link where member_no = #{memberNo}
